urls.title: Opinion | Injections of Bleach? Beams of Light? Trump Is Self-Destructing Before Our Eyes (Published 2020)
urls.description: The notion that he is bound for four more years is pure superstition.

text: Americans who take any comfort from the nightly "briefings" were Trump-drunk long ago. The un-besotted see and hear the president for what he is: a tone-deaf showman who regards everything, even a mountain of corpses, as a stage. My column >>> https://t.co/sAmfSH5whh
